text: Uye vose vachamira pamberi paAllah (pazuva rokutongwa), nokudaro avo vasina simba vachati kune avo vaizvitutumadza (madzimambo): “Zvirokwazvo, taitevera imi, saka munokwanisa here kutidzivirirawo chero nechii zvacho kubva kumarwadzo aAllah?” Vachati: “Dai Allah vakatipa gwara, dai takakutungamirirai. Zvakangofanana nesu (iyezvino) kushaya tarisiro, kana kutsungirira, hatina nzvimbo yokutizira.”
